name: Hearth (tubigervie)
description:
Trapped within, the immense darkness seeks to consume you within the labyrinth. The only means of warding it off is the mysterious pillar of fire providing warmth and respite. But, even that too will eventually fade. Traverse into the abyss in order to gather resources to fuel and maintain your hearth while exploring unfamiliar terrains in order to find out how to extinguish the darkness for good.

Credits:
